summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 1, Mades' First Addition, being the alley from West Hanford Street to West Stevens Street, between 45th Avenue Southwest and 46th Avenue Southwest, by grading the same, and providing the necessary surface drainage and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 102138 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
